The video of a man slitting a minor: s throat was shared on social media along with child-lifting rumors.
The accused: Kailashchand Raigar, murdered his 10-year-old cousin as an act of revenge against his relative's family.
The Superintendent of Police: Sikar Kunwar Rashtradeep, confirmed the details of the incident and stated that there have been no recent child-kidnapping attempts in the area.
